name: Nani Wave - Sand Castle Building Game
name_original: Nani Wave - Sand Castle Building Game
description:
Build the best sand castle and protect it from waves and beach balls!

Main input - Mouse.

1 - hand for hitting balls

2 - 5 - shapes for buidling

Mouse wheel - building block size

Left Mouse Button - Build / hit ball

Right Mouse Button - Remove sand

Escape - pause

Sandbox Mode:

B - launch 1 ball

W - launch 1 wave

F - remove all water and freeze wet sand
